warezcdn.name: Choujigen Game Neptune: The Animation
warezcdn.title: Cho Jigen Game Neptune the Animation

imdb.title: Cho Jigen Game Neptune the Animation
imdb.plot: In the world of Gamindustri, four competing CPU goddesses rule the lands of Lastation, Leanbox, Lowee, and Planeptune. When dark forces threaten their power, they'll have to learn to work together if they want to defeat evil. Base...

episodes.title: The Goddess (Neptune) of Planeptune
episodes.plot: After long years of war, peace has finally come to Gamindustri. As usual, though, the goddess of Planeptune is a little TOO peaceful--gaming is so much more fun than running a country! With the Console Wars over, will the next war be Neptune vs. inertia?!

episodes.title: The Terrorist (Lickorrist) of Lowee
episodes.plot: A day at the amusement park takes a sinister turn when two (mostly) innocent girls are kidnapped by a monster. And then a stranger with a camera crew barges into the Basilicom, and things kinda start to get weird.

episodes.title: A Weekend (Girls' Night) in Leanbox
episodes.plot: Vert offers to throw all the goddesses a party in Leanbox, but when they arrive, she's busy with another kind of party. Then, just as the celebration finally begins, the Basilicom staff reports a monster invasion that has all the CPUs leaping to action.

episodes.title: The Resolve (Turn) of the Younger Sisters
episodes.plot: Nepgear, Uni, Rom, and Ram are instructed to go back home after their sisters' capture, but they can't bear to leave their families behind in danger. To get back their sisters, they'll have to learn how to transform into goddesses themselves.

episodes.title: The Resonance (Limit Break) of the Goddesses
episodes.plot: It's the little sisters to the rescue as Nepgear leads the charge against Arfoire's monsters. But with their older sisters sinking further into darkness every second, can they do anything in time to help?

episodes.title: The Secret (Your-Eyes-Only) of Lastation
episodes.plot: Noire's up to something at night behind closed doors, and Uni's dying to know what it is. Luckily, she's got tech expert Nepgear to help her out. But as it turns out, Uni's not the only one interested in what Noire's doing...

episodes.title: The Fruits (Deep Purple) of Revenge
episodes.plot: The gang learns more about Plutia, and Neptune's very worst, most hated enemy appears.

episodes.title: The Paradise (Island) Forbidden
episodes.plot: The CPUs visit an adults-only island full of forbidden pleasures--for work reasons, of course. Meanwhile, Peashy is stuck at home sulking after a fight with Neptune.

episodes.title: The Challenge (Rebellion) of Eden
episodes.plot: Neptune's maybe having a tiny bit of trouble bouncing back, and Plutia's maybe getting a tiny bit irritated about it. Soon, though, Gamindustri finds itself facing a problem even bigger than Plutia's rage...

episodes.title: The Battlefront (Conflict) of Oblivion
episodes.plot: Eden acts on its bold proclamation and invades Planeptune, but Neptune is too upset to fight, leaving Nepgear on her own. The other CPUs aren't able to run much interference, though, because they've got Eden problems of their own too.

episodes.title: The Emissary (Aggressor) of Old
episodes.plot: All the problems with Eden are over, and the world is finally at peace again--but not everyone is happy about that. Now the nations' Shares are drastically unbalanced, and that never leads to anything good...

episodes.title: The Ties (Bitfrosts) to Tomorrow
episodes.plot: It's the final battle, and the fate of Gamindustri is on the line!

episodes.title: The Eternity (True Ending) Promised
episodes.plot: When all the little sisters get stuck in Bad Ending loops, the CPUs must search far and wide for the cure--whatever dimension it happens to be in!
